features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication system with email/password using Supabase Auth, including login page with multi-language support

features.name: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
features.description: Role-based access control system with 6 user roles (admin, monev, viewer, program_planner, program_implementer, carbon_specialist) and permission checking

features.name: Dashboard Nasional
features.description: Main dashboard displaying aggregated statistics of Perhutanan Sosial data including total PS, total area, RKPS status, and map status

features.name: Data PS Management
features.description: Management and viewing of Perhutanan Sosial data with filtering, searching, and detailed PS profile pages

features.name: PS Profile Tabs
features.description: Detailed PS profile with multiple tabs: Ringkasan, Kelembagaan, Dokumen, Peta, Galeri, Kegiatan, Catatan

features.name: PS Form Management
features.description: Forms for adding and editing PS data, documents, gallery, activities, maps, and notes

features.name: Excel Import
features.description: Upload and import Excel files to database with validation and error handling

features.name: Kabupaten Management
features.description: View and manage data by kabupaten (district) with detailed statistics

features.name: Data Potensi
features.description: View and manage potential forest data

features.name: Statistics Dashboard
features.description: Statistics and analytics dashboard with charts and visualizations

features.name: Carbon Projects
features.description: Carbon project management module for managing carbon credit projects

features.name: Program Management
features.description: Program management module for planning and managing programs

features.name: User Profile
features.description: User profile management with edit functionality

features.name: Internationalization
features.description: Multi-language support for Indonesian and Chinese Traditional using next-intl

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

features.name: Dashboard Layout
features.description: Dashboard layout with sidebar navigation and header

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Supabase client and server utilities for database operations and authentication
